CppUnit Class Hierarchy

This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
  • CppUnit::assertion_traits< T >
  • CppUnit::AutoRegisterSuite< TestCaseType >
  • CppUnit::Exception
    • CppUnit::NotEqualException
  • CppUnit::Exception::Type
  • CppUnit::ExpectedExceptionTraits< ExceptionType >
  • CppUnit::ExpectedExceptionTraits< NoExceptionExpected >
  • CppUnit::NamedRegistries
  • CppUnit::NoExceptionExpected
  • CppUnit::Outputter
    • CppUnit::CompilerOutputter
    • CppUnit::TextOutputter
    • CppUnit::XmlOutputter
  • CppUnit::SourceLine
  • CppUnit::SynchronizedObject
    • CppUnit::TestResult
      • CppUnit::TextTestResult
    • CppUnit::TestSucessListener
      • CppUnit::TestResultCollector
        • CppUnit::TextTestResult
  • CppUnit::SynchronizedObject::ExclusiveZone
  • CppUnit::SynchronizedObject::SynchronizationObject
  • CppUnit::Test
    • CppUnit::TestCase
      • CppUnit::Orthodox< ClassUnderTest >
      • CppUnit::TestCaller< Fixture, ExpectedException >
    • CppUnit::TestDecorator
      • CppUnit::RepeatedTest
      • CppUnit::TestSetUp
    • CppUnit::TestSuite
  • CppUnit::TestFactory
    • CppUnit::TestFactoryRegistry
    • CppUnit::TestSuiteFactory< TestCaseType >
  • CppUnit::TestFailure
  • CppUnit::TestFixture
    • CppUnit::TestCase
  • CppUnit::TestFixtureFactory
  • CppUnit::TestListener
    • CppUnit::TestSucessListener
    • CppUnit::TextTestProgressListener
  • TestPlugInInterface
  • CppUnit::QtUi::TestRunner
  • CppUnit::MfcUi::TestRunner
  • CppUnit::TextUi::TestRunner
  • CppUnit::TestSuiteBuilder< Fixture >
  • CppUnit::XmlOutputter::Node
